Sentencas: Reactive yttrium-doped BaCeO(3) ceramic powders have been prepared by a chemical route based on the citrate technique.
Titulo: Yttrium-doped barium cerate ceramic powders for protonic solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Barium carbonate, cerium nitrate, yttrium nitrate, polyethylene glycol and citric acid have been mixed and heated to produce polymeric resins, that upon heating, yielded BaCe(1-x)Y(x)O(n) fine ceramic powders.
Titulo: Yttrium-doped barium cerate ceramic powders for protonic solid electrolytes

Sentencas: Pressing and sintering produced high density pellets.
Titulo: Yttrium-doped barium cerate ceramic powders for protonic solid electrolytes

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analyses have shown that these pellets are perovskite single phase and protonic solid electrolytes, respectively.
Titulo: Yttrium-doped barium cerate ceramic powders for protonic solid electrolytes

Sentencas: The main applications of these pellets are as solid electrolytes in many electrochemical devices such as methane-based solid oxide fuel cells and hydrogen or steam sensors.
Titulo: Yttrium-doped barium cerate ceramic powders for protonic solid electrolytes
